name: Attuned_Mark_of_Supremacy_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Grants you a 40' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's damage resistance by 10%, boosts regeneration moderately and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
power_display_names: Mark of Supremacy: Endurance/Pet +Resist(All) and +Regen Aura (Mastermind)
power_short_helps: Reduces Endurance Cost and Pet +AoE Resist(All), +Regeneration
